original_text: Your enemy that comes from the north is like a weapon made from iron and bronze. You will never break it. Your enemy that comes from the north
korean_text: 누가 능히 철 곧 북방의 철과 놋을 꺾으리요

sentences.original_text: Your enemy that comes from the north
is like a weapon made from iron and bronze

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것을 결코 부술 수 없을 것이다
